simple.description: Size of the fft used in frequency domain transformation. Larger fft size provides better frequency resolution at the expense of time resolution

How many input elements to overlap? This MUST be less than the fftSize If you go negative you skip elements -- this might be desirable for very fast data rates if you are having a hard time keeping up
Number of output frames to average together for one frame of psd output data. The fft outputs port never averages the data
if this is > 0 apply a log to transform the psd to a log scale. This coefficient is then multiplied by the output value of the log. Typical values for this property are either 10 or 20.

If rfFreqUnits is set to be true - the output SRI is configured so that the units have the centre of the band at RF.
For this to work properly - COL_RF or CHAN_RF must be set as valid keywords.
